summary: A Retexture of Isilmeriel\'s LOTR - Glamdring
descriptionHtml:
This is my first EVER Retexture of An Elder Scrolls series Mod that\'s going Public, so please dont leave too harsh comments...  O_o

Installation : Copy files from zip to your Skyrim directory..

The Mod is not Complete its Just a Retexture of Isilmeriel\'s LOTR - Glamdring,
(!YOU WILL NEED THE ORIGINAL FILES!) all the credits should go to her,Here is the Link http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6687 , I just wanted a blue grip and scabard and then i thought (why not sharing it) 

And Remember if you Like it Endorse it! ;)
author: bravefot
